interpretation: The "people holding hands" card represents unity, connection, and partnership. This card suggests that you are not alone and that there are people in your life who support and care for you. It also signifies the importance of collaboration and teamwork in achieving your goals. This card encourages you to reach out to others and to work together towards a common goal. It may also indicate the need for compromise and finding common ground in a situation. In a love reading, this card suggests a strong and supportive relationship built on trust and mutual respect. Overall, this card reminds you of the power of human connection and the importance of nurturing relationships in your life.
